measured_by: image size chosen in screen environment
justification: “The images were presented… the participant could increase or reduce the image size… The image size was registered and used as one of the measures of social distance.”

measured_by: distance between participant and screen in virtual reality environment
justification: “By using the joystick, the participant could bring the screen closer or farther… The distance… was registered and defined as the second measure of social distance.”

measured_by: Scale of perception of discriminating/being discriminated against
justification: “Scale of perception of discriminating/being discriminated against. In the present study, we introduced a new measure of discrimination…”

measured_by: Scale of motivation for the control of prejudice – internal dimension
justification: “In the present research, two dimensions of the scale for the control of prejudice were used, one of internal motivation…”

measured_by: Scale of motivation for the control of prejudice – external dimension
justification: “In the present research, two dimensions of the scale for the control of prejudice were used… one of external motivation.”

measured_by: Summarized version of the scale of social dominance
justification: “Summarized version of the scale of social dominance” is listed among the self-report instruments administered.

measured_by: Scale of the need for closure
justification: The methods list includes “4. Scale of the need for closure.” as one of the questionnaires completed by participants.
The additional measures section specifies the use of the “Scale of essentialism (biological bases).”
“Regarding skin color, measured using a graphic scale with 20 bands…” indicates how participants’ skin tone was quantified.

measured_by: continuous visual rating scale from 0 to 10
justification: “The measure of the attractiveness of the images was based on a score from 0 to 10… a continuous visual scale was used.”
